name: Build and Run!
description:
Indie Spain Jam Submission!

Build and Run! is a game developed for the IndieSpainJam 2022 edition. 

The theme for this game jam was "from 0 to 100" and the subtheme "replayability".

With this themes in mind we came across with the idea of making a "meta"minigame about completing the compilation process of your video game developed in Unity, which sometimes can be a bit of a pain. Can be confirmed by anyone who participates in a gamejam.

Gameplay:

In this game you need to get the progress bar up to 100% to complete the build of your video game, going forward by playing some easy dumb minigames related with the processes of creating the build of a real video game. Something like a WarioWare.

All of them will be a little different each time you play it!

  • Minigame 1: Compiling code
  • Minigame 2: Importing Assets
  • Minigame 3: Squeezing Shaders
Controls:

Ez Pz Lmn Sqz, just hit that Build and Run! button to start the build.
Mouse left click to Interact.
Escape key to pause the game.

What's left behind:
  • Time countdown in each game (more close to a WarioWare gameplay)
  • Each time the build is completed successfully you can click on the .exe to play a new run "NewBuild++", more dificult (less time fo each minigame)
  • Potential new minigames like a "Simon Says" for sound related process
  • Controlling which minigames you want to play from Main Menu scene in the "Scenes in build" selection
  • Controlling initial dificulty from "Platform" selection
